properties.name: showCard
properties.description: User can bind variable to this and hide/unhide card based on requirement.

properties.name: enableHeader
properties.description: User can enable header of card by setting this flag to true.

properties.name: enableFooter
properties.description: User can enable footer of card by setting this flag to true.

properties.name: headeralign
properties.description: Align of item elements inside card header example : right,center,left.

properties.name: footeralign
properties.description: Align of item elements inside card footer example : right,center,left.
